title: Trump Has A Six Point Lead Over Biden After Debate: Report
content: Donald Trump has developed a six per cent lead over his Democratic rival incumbent Joe Biden with 80 percent saying that the current White House occupant is too old to run for a second term, according to a latest poll by The Wall Street Journal.
summary: Donald Trump has developed a six per cent lead over his Democratic rival incumbent Joe Biden with 80 percent saying that the current White House occupant is too old to run for a second term, according to a latest poll by The Wall Street Journal.

title: Biden "Absolutely Not" Pulling Out Of US Presidential Race: White House
content: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the White House race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted on the president following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.
summary: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the White House race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted on the president following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.

title: 9 In 10 Gazans Displaced Since War Began: UN
content: Around nine in every 10 people in the Gaza Strip have been displaced at least once since the war between Israel and Hamas began, the UN humanitarian agency said Wednesday.
summary: Around nine in every 10 people in the Gaza Strip have been displaced at least once since the war between Israel and Hamas began, the UN humanitarian agency said Wednesday.

title: "I Am Running": Biden Vows To Stay In Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden vowed to stay in the 2024 presidential race during a call with campaign staff on Wednesday and sought to reassure top Democrats on Capitol Hill that he is fit for re-election, despite his poor debate performance last week.
summary: US President Joe Biden vowed to stay in the 2024 presidential race during a call with campaign staff on Wednesday and sought to reassure top Democrats on Capitol Hill that he is fit for re-election, despite his poor debate performance last week.

title: Rishi Sunak 2.0 Or Return Of Labour? UK Votes In Historic Polls Today
content: Britain's political leaders made a final frantic push for votes Wednesday on the last day of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.
summary: Britain's political leaders made a final frantic push for votes Wednesday on the last day of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: Myanmar Shop Owners Are Being Jailed For Raising Employee Wages. Here's Why
content: Wage increases are seen as undermining the regime by making people believe that inflation is rising.
summary: Wage increases are seen as undermining the regime by making people believe that inflation is rising.

title: Ex Senator Among 5 Killed In Blast Near Afghan Border In Pakistan
content: A former Pakistan senator running in a by-election was killed on Wednesday along with four others in a targeted attack on their car near the border with Afghanistan.
summary: A former Pakistan senator running in a by-election was killed on Wednesday along with four others in a targeted attack on their car near the border with Afghanistan.

title: Impostors Raising Funds By Claiming LTTE Chief Is Alive, Says His Family
content: A "mafia gang" which wants to use Prabhakaran as a "brand name", collects funds from Tamils living around the world is operating at a major scale, said Karthic Manoharan, the son of Prabhakaran's elder brother Velupillai Manoharan.
summary: A "mafia gang" which wants to use Prabhakaran as a "brand name", collects funds from Tamils living around the world is operating at a major scale, said Karthic Manoharan, the son of Prabhakaran's elder brother Velupillai Manoharan.

title: Jeff Bezos To Sell $5 Billion Amazon Shares After Stock Hits Record High
content: Amazon founder and executive chair Jeff Bezos is planning to sell almost $5 billion worth of shares in the e-commerce giant, a regulatory filing showed, after its stock hit a record high.
summary: Amazon founder and executive chair Jeff Bezos is planning to sell almost $5 billion worth of shares in the e-commerce giant, a regulatory filing showed, after its stock hit a record high.

title: Artwork Created Nearly 51,200 Years Ago Discovered In Indonesian Cave
content: On the ceiling of a limestone cave on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, scientists have discovered artwork depicting three human-like figures interacting with a wild pig in what they have determined is the world's oldest-known confidently dated
summary: On the ceiling of a limestone cave on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, scientists have discovered artwork depicting three human-like figures interacting with a wild pig in what they have determined is the world's oldest-known confidently dated

title: "China-Russia Ties At High Level": Xi After Meeting "Old Friend" Putin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin told Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Wednesday that relations between Beijing and Moscow were stronger than ever before.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin told Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Wednesday that relations between Beijing and Moscow were stronger than ever before.

title: "Discussed Global Hotspots": S Jaishankar Meets UN Chief In Kazakhstan
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday met UN chief Antonio Guterres and discussed global hotspots and their larger implications apart from the reform of the UNSC.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday met UN chief Antonio Guterres and discussed global hotspots and their larger implications apart from the reform of the UNSC.

title: Delta Flight Makes Emergency Landing After Passengers Served Spoiled Food
content: The airline has not disclosed how the contamination was detected, nor have they provided information on how many of the 277 passengers consumed the meal.
summary: The airline has not disclosed how the contamination was detected, nor have they provided information on how many of the 277 passengers consumed the meal.

title: "Alarm Bell": UN Rights Chief On Rising Hate Speeches During Elections
content: The UN rights chief voiced alarm Wednesday at a hardening of rhetoric, including hate speech and dehumanising language against migrants and other minorities, linked to elections in Europe and elsewhere.
summary: The UN rights chief voiced alarm Wednesday at a hardening of rhetoric, including hate speech and dehumanising language against migrants and other minorities, linked to elections in Europe and elsewhere.

title: Moscow Swelters At 32 Degree Celsius, Beats Record Set In 1917
content: Moscow and the surrounding region sweltered Wednesday as temperatures soared to levels unseen in over a century, with the state weather monitor warning of dangerously hot nights.
summary: Moscow and the surrounding region sweltered Wednesday as temperatures soared to levels unseen in over a century, with the state weather monitor warning of dangerously hot nights.

title: In A First, Canada Appoints Woman To Lead Armed Forces
content: Canada named a woman as the country's top soldier for the first time ever on Wednesday, continuing a push by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to appointment women to the most senior jobs.
summary: Canada named a woman as the country's top soldier for the first time ever on Wednesday, continuing a push by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to appointment women to the most senior jobs.

title: Ex Pak PM Imran Khan Seeks Permission From Court To Meet His Sons In Jail
content: Pakistan's anti-terrorism court in Rawalpindi has asked the government and jail administration to respond to Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf chief Imran Khan's request to meet his sons, Pakistan-based daily, The Express Tribune reported on Wednesday.
summary: Pakistan's anti-terrorism court in Rawalpindi has asked the government and jail administration to respond to Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf chief Imran Khan's request to meet his sons, Pakistan-based daily, The Express Tribune reported on Wednesday.

title: US Independence Day 2024: What's Open And Closed On July 4th? Check Here
content: Independence Day arrives Thursday and several offices and businesses will be closed to commemorate the holiday.
summary: Independence Day arrives Thursday and several offices and businesses will be closed to commemorate the holiday.

title: Chinese Man Poses As Doctor, Dupes Girlfriend Of Rs 3 Crore
content: During their six-year relationship, Zhang portrayed himself as an obstetrician-gynaecologist at a prestigious Shanghai hospital.
summary: During their six-year relationship, Zhang portrayed himself as an obstetrician-gynaecologist at a prestigious Shanghai hospital.

title: Explained: What Happens In The UK General Election
content: Britain will hold a parliamentary election on July 4 which opinion polls indicate will hand power to Keir Starmer's Labour Party and end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government.
summary: Britain will hold a parliamentary election on July 4 which opinion polls indicate will hand power to Keir Starmer's Labour Party and end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government.
